1488530.name: The Host: Cataclysm
1488530.description:
Fight towering beasts, survive a shattered world, and forge your legend in a post-apocalyptic fantasy where magic is outlawed and survival means rebellion.

The world has long lived in the ashes of an Armageddon. Now, a once-heroic champion has chosen the path of evil, leaving kingdoms divided and people struggling under new oppression. Magic is hunted to extinction, and colossal creatures roam to keep humanity under control. Seven races fight to endure in a land where rebellion is the only hope.

Step into the role of one of these races and fight back. Explore vast seas, sail between fractured kingdoms, uncover dungeons and ancient temples, and test your wits against riddles left behind by lost civilizations. Craft weapons and armor, and grow your skill tree as you master the path you’ve chosen. You can face this world alone or with up to seven other players, choosing whether to fight side by side as allies or clash as enemies. Work together to hunt massive world bosses, or carve your own legend in defiance of the forces that would keep you under their control.

Take up arms, rally your strength, and rise against the darkness that has gripped the world.
